res=$(CocoaDialog inputbox --title "Decrypt AES 128 Encrypted Text" --informative-text "What is the password?" --text "s3cr37" --button1 "Decrypt" --button2 "Cancel")
[[ $(head -n1 <<<"$res") == "2" ]] && exit_discard passwd=$(tail -n1 <<<"$res")
if ! openssl enc -d -aes128 -base64 -pass "pass:$passwd"; then exit_show_tool_tip fi
